name: The Cabin (itch)
description:
Created by Jacob Vincent and Nicholas Efthimiou.

The Cabin is our entry for the 7dfps game jam for 2014 and our first attempt at a game jam. We recommend downloading the standalone version for the best experience.

The goal is to explore the cabin and it's mysteries and ultimately find your way out.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
LMB - Interact
RMB - Zoom In
E - Rotate held item
F - Toggle flashlight (once acquired)
